response.overview: The voice from the documentary Colombia Magia Salvaje (2015), cloned by artificial intelligence, talks about an endemic bird and its diet in a digital environment, a level of the video game Call of Duty: Ghosts. Most of the map's elements are assemblages of plants and animals found in urban environments, many used for ornamental purposes. The video takes a tour of this RIPPED space (this is what the forced extraction of geometries found in video games is called), in a structure that describes the place sometimes as an ecosystem and other times as a composition of lifeless images from different origins.
response.title: Arreglo selvático: El pájaro intestino
